title: Saudi Arabian National Football Team Squad 2021
image_instruction: Show clips of the Saudi Arabian team playing
script: Here is the Saudi Arabian national football team squad for 2021. With an experienced coach, D. Jeličić, leading the way, the team is ready to take on its opponents. Goalkeeper D. Ospina, defender S. Al Ghannam, midfielder Talisca, and striker C. Ronaldo are some of the key players to watch out for. With a mix of young and experienced players, the Saudi Arabian team is definitely one to watch this year. Let's cheer them on to victory!
